entries.description: A notification is shown on startup indicating that JetBrains 2019.2 or greater will be required in an upcoming AWS Toolkit release
Add --no-interactive to SAM init when running a version of SAM >= 0.30.0
Bump minimum SAM CLI version from 0.14.1 to 0.16.0
Adding support for JetBrains Platform version 2019.3.
Fix error thrown adding Lambda gutter icons and not having any active credentials
Fix validating a Lambda handler not under a ReadAction
